description: From Middle English freschely, freschliche (also as ferscheli, fersly, ferselich), equivalent to fresh +â€Ž -ly.

adverbs.description: freshly (comparative more freshly, superlative most freshly)

examples: The freshly picked flowers will wilt in a few days but for now are still fragrant.

entries.meaning: (uncommon) In a rude or impertinent manner.
